name: NBCNewsRadioHealth
0:
”Alexa, what's my Flash Briefing?”
”Alexa, play my Flash Briefing”
skdetail:
Flash Briefing Skill
This skill contains: dynamic content.
Developer Terms of Use
des:
A one-minute health news summary from NBC News Radio. Updated daily. 

After enabling this skill, say “Alexa, what’s my flash briefing” or “Alexa, what’s in the news” to hear NBC News Radio content in your flash briefing. 

Go to Settings in your Alexa app and find “Flash Briefing” to edit the order of content feeds in your news update. 

The information in this skill is provided for informational and educational purposes only.
priv:
Developer Privacy Policy
The developer reported that this skill does not collect personal information.
